item.title: Delta D Claw Spec Issue
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

[code]public int dclaws = 0;
public int clawss = 0;
public int clawrights = 0;
public int clawrights2 = 0;

Now Add This Public Void

Quote
public void dclawed3() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed3 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/4);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
attackTimer = 7;
lastAttack = System.currentTimeMillis();
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed3);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed3;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}
public void dclawed2() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed2 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/2);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
attackTimer = 7;
lastAttack = System.currentTimeMillis();
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed2);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed2;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}
public void dclawed() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
attackTimer = 7;
lastAttack = System.currentTimeMillis();
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}

Now Search For
Quote
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
Under It ADD This

Quote
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAmount -= 50;
dclaws = 3;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
setAnimation(2068);
specOn = false;
}
Change The 8002 To The The Id OF You’re Claws But Most Server’s And Clients Have 8002 AS D Claw Id…

Now Search

Quote
public boolean process() {
Under
Quote
if (playerEnergy < 100 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastIncrease >= 7000) {
playerEnergy += 1;
WriteEnergy();
lastIncrease = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

Under It Add This
Quote
if(dclaws == 3) {
dclawed();
}

if(dclaws == 2) {
startAnimation(2068);
dclawed2();
}

if(dclaws == 1) {
dclawed2();
actionInterval = getbattleTimer() + getbattleTimer()/2;
}[/code]

the whole d claw spec look like that

Read full topic

item.title: Delta D Claw Spec Issue
item.dc:creator: @shoopdawhoop shoopdawhoop
item.description:
@shoopdawhoop wrote:

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0;
if you have that added under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

you probably may have changed “false;” to “true;”

add the above code under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

(the only way i see you hitting “crazy” such as A LOT of hits say
0-0-0-20 then 0-0-0-5
and kept on repeating that order but with a different hit)

If this doesn’t help, or you don’t even have this then sorry,
but i changed false’ to true’ and i kept hitting a lot of hits.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta D Claw Spec Issue
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

public void dclawed3() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int clawed3 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/4); if(AttackingOn2 != null) { if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) { dclaws = 0; } else { attackTimer = 7; lastAttack = System.currentTimeMillis(); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(3) != 1) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed3); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed3; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0; } PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff; } } } public void dclawed2() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int clawed2 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/2); if(AttackingOn2 != null) { if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) { dclaws = 0; } else { attackTimer = 7; lastAttack = System.currentTimeMillis(); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(3) != 1) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed2); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed2; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0; } PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff; } } } public void dclawed() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int clawed = misc.random(playerMaxHit); if(AttackingOn2 != null) { if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) { dclaws = 0; } else { attackTimer = 7; lastAttack = System.currentTimeMillis(); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(3) != 1) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0; } PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff; } } }

but when i use the special i hit like crazy, than if i switch wep that wep hit crazy
